blocks.subject: Re: Bay State
text: When did Bay State bill ENA for this?  And, did Bay State pay there bill for
gas ENA sold them or did they deduct this from the payment?
It does work out to 5,500 dt per day at $.09.
Isabel Y Resendez

blocks.subject: Re: Bay State
raw_header: cc: Genaro Mendoza/NA/Enron@Enron, Elizabeth L Hernandez/HOU/ECT@ECT
text: Hello Chris,
Remember the demand charge that was entered in the sales side that you killed
about a week ago?(deal # 233091)  Well, the demand charges need to be in the
purchase side not the sales side.  Per Bay State, Enron should be paying the
demand charges.  Are they correct???  Bay State is also charging interest for
late payment.  Please let me know if you need any more information.
Production month Amount
Interest   $926.32

raw_header: ---------------------- Forwarded by Isabel Y Resendez/HOU/ECT on 09/21/2000

blocks.subject: Re: Bay State
text: Good morning Elizabeth,
Do you know if Chris put in the demand charge on the purchase side???
Bay State is charging Genaro the demand charge on the purchase side.
Thank you for you help
isabel
Elizabeth L Hernandez

blocks.subject: Re: Bay State
text: I forwarded this information to Chris Germany and I know he was working on it
Friday.  I will get with him today to find out what the status of this issue
is.  I'll get back with you.
Isabel Y Resendez

blocks.to: Elizabeth L Hernandez/HOU/ECT@ECT  Isabel Y Resendez/HOU/ECT@ECT
blocks.subject: Re: Bay State  Good Elizabeth, Could you give me an update on this matter.  Please let me know if you need  anything from me or if you want me to speak to someone.  Thank you  isabel ---------------------- Forwarded by Isabel Y Resendez/HOU/ECT on 09/11/2000  10:29 AM ---------------------------     	Enron North America Corp. 	  Re: Bay State
raw_header: Could you give me an update on this matter.  Please let me know if you need
anything from me or if you want me to speak to someone.
---------------------- Forwarded by Isabel Y Resendez/HOU/ECT on 09/11/2000
text: I have forwarded the following request to Elizabeth Hernandez.  She handles
the East desk.  Any deals regarding the Central, Ontario or West desk please
send to me!!
smj

blocks.subject: Bay State
text: Shawna,
I am Isabel and I work in Gas Settlements.  Could you help me out with the
following?
Deal # 233091 for Bay State is charging a demand charge every month.
Accourding to Bay State Enron should not be charging demand charges.  Could
you let me know if this correct.  Should Enron be charging demand charges?
Maureen Smith is down as the trader on the deal.  However, I am not sure if
that is correct.  Please let me know if you are not the correct person to
send this note too.
Thank you for your help!
isabel
